unique elements of array in Perl 

my @new_a = keys %{ {map {$_ => } @a} };

例子:

use Modern::Perl;
use Data::Dumper;

my @a = (
    { a => 'b'},
    { a => 'c'},
    { a => 'b'},
);

say "-----------------------";

my $e = [ keys %{ {map {$_ => 1}  map {$_->{a} } @a } } ];

say Dumper $e;

输出:

-----------------------
$VAR1 = [
          'c',
          'b'
        ];
